      class  NetWorkInterface.TraiterPacketRecu

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetWorkInterface

        public NetWorkInterface(Controller controller)
        This construcor launch 3 thread in order to be able to send message, receive them and also to receive a file.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller used to give every message we receive in order to give them to the Gui and display something at the screen if necessary
        See Also:
        Controller, UDPSender, UDPReceiver, TCPReceiver

      • treatMessage

        public void treatMessage(MessageGlobal toTreat)
        This method do something with the message we just receive by the UDP channel. For sample, the NI use the Controller to tell the Gui to udpate the user list displayed at the screen if we receive a helloAck message or a hell message.
        Parameters:
        toTreat - the message we need to tread.
        See Also:
        MessageGlobal
